item.description:
Join us for our FIRST South Shore Dining Out Meetup!

We will be dining out at Finian's Restaurant in Quincy. Located on the corner of School and Hancock Streets on Route 53 at the south end of Quincy Center, Finian's offers a wide variety of food sure to please everyone's palate. Wednesday nights features a "Dinner for 2" for $14.95/duo featuring 20 different menu items. This allows each person to choose their meal from 20 options, providing a delicious meal for only $7.50/person. You can pair up with someone to take advantage of the "Dinner for 2" or you can go your own way and choose from many of the meals, appetizers, and salads offered.

This will be a great opportunity to meet and get to know each other, as well as talk about different foods, restaurants, and meals we enjoy. This will also be a great time to plan our next Dining Out event.

Please see our "About" page for full details.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the meal, including but not limited to, your drinks, food, tax, and tip and any shared items.


***Please Note: This event has been pushed back from Monday, September 18th.***

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group Kick-Off Meetup!
